==Japanese==

===Etymology===
{{ja-kanjitab}}
Reanalysis of {{m|ja|小女子|tr=kōnago}} as a small sand lance, and replacingly prefixing {{prefix|lang=ja|sort=おおなご|大|tr1=ō|t1=big|女子|tr2=nago|t2=''bound morpheme of 小女子, interpretted as sand lance''}} to form an antonym thereof.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|おおなご|オオナゴ}}

# big [[sand lance]]
